title: Gigabitcapable Passive Optical Network GPON
extract: One way of providing fiber to the home is through a Gigabit Passive Optical Network, or GPON. GPON is a point-to-multipoint access network. ... GPON has a downstream capacity of 2.488 Gb/s and an upstream capacity of 1.244 Gbp/s that is shared among users.
extract_html: One way of providing fiber to the home is through a Gigabit Passive Optical Network, or GPON. GPON is a point-to-multipoint access network. ... GPON has a downstream capacity of 2.488 Gb/s and an upstream capacity of 1.244 Gbp/s that is shared among users.
